name: Logging
description: Logging facility based on SLF4J in Java

scripts.pretest: rm -rf js; ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -c -o js src/ && ./node_modules/.bin/coffee -c -o js/test test/
scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- -u tdd -R spec js/test/*Test.js js/test/**/*Test.js

author: Daniel
